text: One of the ECs with the best layout and spacious kitchen. Suitable for families. Very convenient to the MRT as bus stop is just outside the condo.

Equipped with world class gym and incredibly beautiful scenery facing the sea when jogging. Just next door to downtown east and 2 minutes walk to the beach. Resort style living away from the hustle and bustle of the city. Minutes drive to Changi beach and supper makan. Perfect location for family.

Visited my old friend here and praised him for finding reasonable place to stay away from all the hectic work life in Singapore.   It is only minutes away from the beach and he loves the wildlife he can find here.  Relaxing in Style.

Relatively well-built condominium with adequate facilities. The gym is very complete compared to other estates, and the carpark is rather easy to navigate. The is some wear-and-tear in certain equipment that have not been fixed, and the place can be a little tricky to navigate for newcomers.
